items.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customization and Configuration

visible_instructors.job_title: MS Dynamics CRM Application Consultant & Trainer
visible_instructors.name: Brian
visible_instructors.title: Brian Clark

items.headline: Pass the MB2-716 certification on the first attempt. 258 questions
objectives_summary: Customizations, also referred to as CRM extensions, include allocation of simple to complex customizations using CRM Software Development Kit. We can add Entities, Views, Fields, Option Sets, Client Extensions, Web Resources, Processes, Plugin Assemblies, Reports and SLAs, among others. Customization requires an individual to have deep technical and product knowledge. Customizations are often unique to a solution and add new features to meet requirements.

Configuration on the other hand refers to the structure and administration of the system. This service is essential to improve the UI design, field settings, security, business rules and more. Configuration also requires an individual to have deep product knowledge. Configurations are not unique and can be carried out identically on any instance and customize existing features to meet requirements.
Configuration is often considered better than customization as it is a low cost approach that preserves Dynamics 365 design standards and avoids problems with upgrades.
